result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Santana Carlos Torres

defendant.name: Torres, Santana Carlos
defendant.address: 2024 Green Tree Rd # 1, West Bend, WI 53090

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: EZ. Prosecuting attorney Elizabeth A Longo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Santana Carlos Torres in court.  Attorney Sara Kneevers in court for Santana Carlos Torres.  State informs there is a TAD recommendation upon plea to Count 1, recommend Count 2 be dismissed for read-in.  Upon successful completion of TAD recommend 7 days jail with Huber; unsuccessful completion recommend 25 days jail with Huber Fine of $1,429.00; DNA sample; 12 mo. revocation; 12 mo. IID and AODA.  WITNESS:  Santana C. T.  Guilty plea entered to Count 1. Court dismissed Count 2 for read-in.  Defendant admits prior conviction.  Court accepts the plea to Count 1.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 4, 2023 at 08:15 am.
Sentencing hearing on January 4, 2023 at 08:15 am.

Clerk: EZ. Prosecuting attorney Jeanette Kara Corbett in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Santana Carlos Torres in court.  Attorney Sara Kneevers in court for Santana Carlos Torres.  Atty. Kneevers requests an adjournment for defendant to have a TAD assessment and defendant has about half of funds saved.
Hearing scheduled for May 3, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Prosecuting attorney Mark David Bensen appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Santana Carlos Torres appeared in court, Attorney Sara Kneevers appeared in court for Santana Carlos Torres. Clerk: EZ.  Counsel's first appearance and request adjournment to further discuss the offer.
Hearing scheduled for March 24, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Reset Hearing from 2-2-2022 to on February 16, 2022 at 02:45 pm. due to conflict by counsel.
Demand and Motion for Discovery & Inspection

Prosecuting attorney Scott M Corbett appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Santana Carlos Torres appeared in court. Clerk: EZ.  Defendant states does not have retainer but has been looking for an attorney.  Court appoints Atty Sara Kneevers.  Defendant shall reimburse Washington County at a rate to be determined.
Hearing scheduled for February 2, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Defendant shall maintain absolute sobriety. Not possess any controlled substance without valid prescription.

Prosecuting attorney Jeanette Kara Corbett appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Santana Carlos Torres appeared in court. Clerk: EZ. Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found. Not guilty plea entered by Court.  State does not oppose a signature bond.  Court orders $500.00 signature bond  Court determines defendant not eligible for State Public Defender. Adjourned to allow defendant to appear with an attorney.
Hearing scheduled for January 24, 2022 at 09:45 am.
